body_html:
Looks like your CPU device is not overriding the

virtual ScopedAllocatorMgr* GetScopedAllocatorMgr() const { return nullptr; }

method on DeviceBase. It is overridden in common_runtime/threadpool_device.h, which is normally the only way of building a CPU device. I'm not sure whether this is an issue with the MacOS build or something specific to your build. Given some more time, I'll try to reproduce.
